About Me

Hi.

I’m Chris Blanchard. I’m a former runner, a novice mountaineer, and an aspiring conservationist. I was born in Pittsburgh, went to Duke, and live in San Francisco.

I’m a self-taught programmer turned Product Manager at Zignal Labs.

I believe that software is eating the world, and it’s on us to decide how.

I get a little too excited by topographic maps, board games, and bourbon, among other things.

Welcome to my personal slice of internet. If you made it this far, say hello, weirdo.
